p: A mixture of palmitic acid (2.6 g, 0.01 mol), absolute ethanol (50 ml) and few drops of conc. sulphuric acid (0.5 ml) was refluxed for 10 h in a round bottom flask and then cooled to 5 °C. The liquid product was separated from reaction mixture by using ether on the basis of density and then purified [ 26].
